page.title: 11FAMILY LIFE
page.content: _ On work days,my dad (who is a miner), gets up at 4.00am. and makes a cup of tea.He sets off to work at 4.15am.The rest of us get up at 8.00am I set off for school at 8.45am. and arrive there at 8.55am.School finishes at 3.30pm, but my dad gets home at 2.30pm.when he sits down and relaxes. On a rest day our whole family gets up at about 10.00am,with my dad usually getting up first.Sometimes we go out in the car and visit our relations or even go to the seaside in the summer months.If we stay at home we usually watch the television or play boxed games,for example "Monopoly"and"Scrabble".
